items.text:
A reverent calm suffuses your being as you step into the Ancestor’s
Grove. Each of the trees, from the smallest sapling to the towering
giants at the grove’s center, has been planted over the final resting
place of a loved one. You move with care through the grove. You
see several people, some keeping to themselves, some speaking
softly, some bearing gifts, all here to commune with those who have
passed. You pause and give thought to your ancestors.
